resources.string: Medical Care: If we can know the emotional state of patients, especially patients with expression disorders, we can make different nursing measures according to the emotions of patients and improve the amount of nursing care.

Product Development: If you can identify the emotional state in the process of using the product and understand the user experience, you can design a product that is more suitable for the needs of user by improving the product performance.
Human-machine Interaction Systems: If the system can recognize the emotional state of the person, the human-machine interaction will become more friendly and natural.
